msbt.message: Tommy or Timmy would be happy to provide you with your tent, hm?
We're all just getting started here, so please feel free to set up your tent anywhere you like. Oh! Except for this plaza area, of course. We'll need a communal spot like this, hm?

Are you worried about finding just the right spot? <10_4 />Don't be!For now, choose a spot that speaks to you. Trust your instincts! It has always worked for me. Yes, yes! And, down the road, if you feel you've made a mistake, we can talk about relocating, hm?

I'm afraid I'm just as new to this island as you are, so I can't offer any recommendations quite yet. And I do have one more small favor to askPlease don't pick up anything from the ground. And please don't shake the trees either. No, no! The proper waivers must be signed first, hm?
It seems like you finished setting up your tent, .I wonder how the others are doing. Can you wait here while we check on them, hmm?
No problem.
I'd like to look around.
Thank you! So helpful of you!
Timmy, Tommy Can you check on our guests, and ? Once they've set up their tents, bring them back here, yes, yes.
On it!
Of course, of course. Take your time. There's no need to feel rushed by the clock on an uninhabited island. Just let me know when you're all set.
Did you finish doing your things that needed doing, ?Then we should check in on the other two. Can you wait here while we go help them?
Sure.
I need more time.
Ah, . You must have found a suitable spot for your tent, hm?

You're the first one back, so I suppose the others must still be searching for just the right location. You knowsince you've already done some scouting, the others may appreciate your assistance. Yes, yes!
Hmm hasn't returned yet, so she's probably still out looking for a spot. Would you mind lending her a helping hand? I'm very excited to move on to our next steps.
Hmm hasn't returned yet, so he's probably still out looking for a spot. Would you mind lending him a helping hand? I'm very excited to move on to our next steps.
I hear that you've been nominated to be our lead tent-location scout. Oho! By all means, continue helping the others, and then meet me back here when you're done, hm?

I hear you've volunteered to help set up his tent.By all means, carry on, and then meet me back here when you're done, hm?
I hear you've volunteered to help set up her tent.By all means, carry on, and then meet me back here when you're done, hm?
Would you be so kind as to lend a helping hand to others as they set up their tents, ?And, after that's all taken care of, come on back here again!
Excuse me! We're setting up a Resident Services facility in there, but it's not ready for you just yet. Please give us a little more time to get things ready for you.

Ah, yes! There you are. There's something I really need to talk to you about, .You moved here after taking part in a Deserted Island Getaway Package on a different island, correct?Unfortunately, we're still waiting on the plane carrying your things, so we don't have your house set up yet.It would have been ideal to have your house and belongings ready before you arrivedbut that's not possible.I promise you that everything will be here on the morrow! But tonightWe humbly ask that you spend the night in a tent like the others.

Ah, !You likely already heard about your belongings and house from Timmy or Tommy, hm?Unfortunately, the flight carrying them was delayed slightly, so we won't have your house ready today.I promise you that everything will be here on the morrow! But tonightWe humbly ask that you spend the night in a tent like the others.
